title: Handle a Bounced Rent Check
description: A tenant's rent check was returned for non-sufficient funds (NSF). The agent must reverse the payment and charge the appropriate fees.

tasks.description: Receive the NSF notification from the bank.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the tenant and the bounced payment.

tasks.description: Reverse the rent payment on the tenant's ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly removes the credited payment, making the rent outstanding again.

tasks.description: Apply the NSF fee and any applicable late fees to the tenant's ledger and send them a notice to pay the new balance in certified funds.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent charges all applicable fees and sends a formal demand notice.
